title: BMW Ladies Classic
text:
The BMW Ladies Classic was a women's professional <a href="golf">golf</a> tournament on the <a href="Ladies%20European%20Tour">Ladies European Tour</a> that took place near <a href="D%C3%BCsseldorf">Düsseldorf</a>, <a href="Germany">Germany</a>.
The 1989 tournament held June 8–11 is notable as it marked <a href="Marie-Laure%20de%20Lorenzi">Marie-Laure de Lorenzi</a>'s third consecutive back-to-back win, a <a href="Ladies%20European%20Tour%20records">Ladies European Tour record</a>.
Winners.
Source:
